frontMatter.title: Celsius to Fahrenheit
frontMatter.description: Write a program to convert the temperature from Celsius to Fahrenheit

contentHtml:
Write a program to convert the temperature from Celsius to Fahrenheit

Input ( c )  : -40
Output ( F ) : -40
markdown:
## Write a program to convert the temperature from Celsius to Fahrenheit

```txt
Input ( c )  : -40
Output ( F ) : -40
```

---
